requestParams.name: retail_source
requestParams.desc: 零售调用来源(调用方和有赞约定的值)

requestDemos.code:
token = auth.Token(token='token') #auth.Sign(app_id='app_id', app_secret='app_secret')

client = YZClient(token)

params={}

params['wei_xin']="326575456"
params['supplier_name']="特步的供应商"
params['retail_source']="RENWOXING"
params['remark']="江南大道"
params['qq']="47675432"
params['phone']=""
params['fax']=""
params['email']="47675432@qq.com"
params['contacts_phone']="13587678765"
params['contacts']="老王"
params['address']="江南大道"

files=[]

print client.invoke('youzan.retail.open.supplier.create', '3.0.0', 'POST', params=params, files=files)
